mapper.select: select count(1) from torganization t where str_to_date(t.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') < date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') and t.is_enable=true
select count(1) from torganization t where str_to_date(t.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') and t.is_enable=true
select count(1) from torganization t where t.is_enable=true and yearweek(str_to_date(t.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')) = yearweek(now())-1

select t.org_name orgName,t.create_time createTime, (select count(1) from tcamera c where c.cam_org_id=t.org_id and c.cam_state=1) onlineTotal, (select count(1) from tcamera c where c.cam_org_id=t.org_id) total from torganization t where t.is_enable=true order by t.create_time desc limit 30
select t.name, (select count(1) from torganization o where o.region_path like concat(t.region_path, '%') and o.is_enable=true ) count from tcontrolunitdto t where t.unitLevel=2 order by count desc
select count(1) from torganization t where t.controlUnitName=#{value} and t.is_enable=true
